name: stimuli
description: Stimuli / feedback in the context of an experiment. Usually of the types Visual, Auditory, Olfactory, Gustatory, Somatosensory

device_list.description: list of device types that are required to run this stimuli / response / feedback / delays

stimuli_files.description: Link to Stim Folder with stim metadata.

bounding_box.description: Dimensions of the rectangular bounding box surface where the stimuli are presented. { width, height }

background.description: Background colour of the stimulus surface. Format [R, G, B, A]

provenance.description: Description of the source / method using which the stimuli were created / generated. e.g. Facegen Modeler for creating faces
